Directions: In a large saucepan or soup kettle, saute onions and garlic in butte until tender. add the carrots, celery, potatoes, zucchini, broth, parsley and thyme. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat; cover and simmer until vegetables are tender, about 20 minutes.
Stir in peas and corn. In a bowl, combine flour, milk, salt if desired and pepper until smooth; gradually add to soup. Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened.
Ingredients: 2 (10.5 ounce) cans condensed chicken broth, undiluted
